channel.title: K3s on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in K3s on Notebook

item.description: K3d # Installation # K3d CLI binaries: https://github.com/k3d-io/k3d/releases/download/v5.4.8/k3d-windows-amd64.exe https://github.com/k3d-io/k3d/releases/download/v5.4.8/k3d-linux-amd64 Test # k3d cluster create mycluster kubectl cluster-info kubectl get all k3d cluster delete mycluster
